extension.name: Jdonation - ACYM newsletter Plugin
extension.author: Dang Thuc Dam
extension.description: This plugin is user to subscriber donors to Acym newsletter. This plugin need Acym extension to be installed.

param.name: list_ids
param.label: List Ids
param.description: Enter IDs of ACYM lists which you want donors to subscribe to automatically (comma seperated). Leave it blank to subscribe donors to all the current available lists

field.name: list_ids
field.label: List Ids
field.description: Enter IDs of ACYM lists which you want donors to subscribe to automatically (comma seperated). Leave it blank to subscribe donors to all the current available lists
